mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This Gem can be inserted into a Socket slot
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus dmg at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Right Click on Map Device to Use

mmorpg.word.holdtopreventpickup: Hold in your hand to prevent item pickup.
mmorpg.word.item_modifiable_in_station: Can be used inside Modify Station
mmorpg.word.passivedesc: Cast when hit by mob at low health.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyfirst: Use to identify first item in inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoteleport: Use to teleport back from Adventure Map.
mmorpg.word.socketlvlisnthigherthaniteml: Socket lvl not higher than gear lvl
mmorpg.word.stormcloudspelldesc: Summons a storm cloud that deals damage over time.
mmorpg.word.useanidentifyscroll: An Identify Scroll can reveal it.

mmorpg.chat.a_piece_of_gear_is_too_high_: You Don't meet requirements of a piece of current gear.
mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over maximum level
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Age of Exile [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath
mmorpg.unique_gear.beast_blood.desc: Accept the blood, suffer the Sacrifice. Be reborn anew.
mmorpg.unique_gear.crown_of_elements.des: Have you ever felt true power?
mmorpg.unique_gear.exec_pride.desc: To miss is not an option.
mmorpg.unique_gear.fifth_rider.desc: The only thing that's missing is the horse.
mmorpg.unique_gear.frost_crown.desc: Everyone needs a proper burial, and I will make theirs dazzling.
mmorpg.unique_gear.gluttony_helmet.desc: If only hunger could be sated, I would not be doomed.
mmorpg.unique_gear.harbinger.desc: His eyes like black holes, his armor had the color of horizon.
mmorpg.unique_gear.inner_conflux.desc: Merge the Rivers of Mana and Magic, attain infinity, or die.
mmorpg.unique_gear.jester_hat.desc: One, two, three, fail. Whoops! One, two..
mmorpg.unique_gear.kingmaker.desc: Alone we falter, together we rise.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ms_armor_chest.desc: If only they knew that the inscription referred to the armor.
mmorpg.unique_gear.angel_prot_necklace.d: If your guardian is careful enough, you just might think they don't exist.
mmorpg.unique_gear.birth_miracle.desc: Life can sometimes keep on giving.
mmorpg.unique_gear.greed_persist.desc: When desire for perfection overtakes your sanity, you too will be blessed.
mmorpg.unique_gear.hunger_neck.desc: They say the only way to take off this necklace is to rid yourself of your mortal flesh.
mmorpg.unique_gear.loop_of_infinity.desc: Is it truly an end if everything just starts all over again? Maybe it really is just a loop.
mmorpg.unique_gear.skull_of_spirits.desc: The mysterious skull contains knowledge of the contained spirits, but also their madness.
mmorpg.unique_gear.snake_eye.desc: Eternally dead, and yet not blind.
mmorpg.unique_gear.solar_ring.desc: Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the brightest of them all?
mmorpg.unique_gear.touch_of_eternity.des: Worn by Kings, Beggars, Barbarians, Queens, Prophets and now ... you.
mmorpg.unique_gear.divine_might.desc: God might prefer peaceful means, but sometimes peace is not an option.
mmorpg.unique_gear.eye_of_zegrath.desc: A cultist once so powerful, even his remnant eye inflicts ills on others.
mmorpg.unique_gear.frigid_staff.desc: Found in a deep pit of ice. Many wands were shattered in attempts to imbue it.
mmorpg.unique_gear.inca_thunder.desc: The ability to wield thunder is said to come once in a millennium.
mmorpg.unique_gear.obsi_might.desc: This thirst for blood only seems lower than it's desire to taste burning flesh.
mmorpg.unique_gear.rot_phys.desc: Strange things you find yourself liking. Like a stick, with a piece of rotten flesh on it.
mmorpg.unique_gear.will_of_flora.desc: Everything must be exactly as required.
mmorpg.unique_gear.worldbearer.desc: The ability to carry any burden is a heavy one.
mmorpg.unique_gear.lifesprig.desc: From the smallest seeds, to the tallest redwoods, life endures.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_poets_pen.desc: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.
mmorpg.unique_gear.redbeak.desc: As battle calms, blood turns to rust.
mmorpg.unique_gear.limbsplit.desc: Swinging through the air, it sings of sundered, severed, missing things.
mmorpg.unique_gear.wanderlust.desc: All the world is my home.
mmorpg.unique_gear.rainbowstride.desc: They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride. Some men have a longer stride than others.
mmorpg.unique_gear.fencoil.desc: You've no reason for fear when you're a root in a fen.
mmorpg.unique_gear.mirebough.desc: Cut down the tallest tree, and another becomes the tallest.
mmorpg.unique_gear.rise_of_the_phoenix.d: My bearer shall be guarded by flame, for I am the phoenix.
mmorpg.unique_gear.sunblast.desc: The sun's fury, trapped in pillars of blazing light.
mmorpg.unique_gear.tinkerskin.desc: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.
mmorpg.unique_gear.sunstalker.desc: Trapped in pillars of blazing light, explodes from its cage.
mmorpg.unique_gear.tearhaunch.desc: We must prove our value to the One, by sating his hunger for life.
mmorpg.unique_gear.stormcharger.desc: Like lightning, the cavalry need never strike twice.
mmorpg.unique_gear.cloth_goldwyrm.desc: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.
mmorpg.unique_gear.leather_goldwyrm.desc: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.
mmorpg.unique_gear.plate_goldwyrm.desc: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.
mmorpg.unique_gear.cloth_skullders_ire.d: A single taste leaves you wanting more.
mmorpg.unique_gear.plate_skullders_ire.d: A single taste leaves you wanting more.
mmorpg.unique_gear.leather_skullders_ire: A single taste leaves you wanting more.
mmorpg.unique_gear.plate_goldrim.desc: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.
mmorpg.unique_gear.cloth_goldrim.desc: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.
mmorpg.unique_gear.leather_goldrim.desc: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.
mmorpg.unique_gear.cloth_goldwrap.desc: Coddled by riches, he has no heart.
mmorpg.unique_gear.plate_goldwrap.desc: Coddled by riches, he has no heart.
mmorpg.unique_gear.leather_goldwrap.desc: Coddled by riches, he has no heart.
mmorpg.unique_gear.thousand_ribbons.desc: The night of a thousand ribbons.
mmorpg.unique_gear.cloak_of_flame.desc: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.
mmorpg.unique_gear.solaris_lorica.desc: Light the path to greatness, so that I may begin my bright pursuit.
mmorpg.unique_gear.iron_heart.desc: The council have a great many secrets. Some are better kept that way.
mmorpg.unique_gear.peasant_crown.desc: The light drove the darkness from our lands and from our hearts.
mmorpg.unique_gear.asenaths_mark.desc: His mind was as quick and nimble as the fingers that drew his bowstring.
mmorpg.unique_gear.heatshiver.desc: Give of your heated passions. Give of your cold resolve. You will be repaid.
mmorpg.unique_gear.alphas_howl.desc: Nature respects the strong and paints the snow red with the blood of the weak.
mmorpg.unique_gear.enzomyte_hold.desc: A moment of victory may last an eternity in memory.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_baron.desc: The emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who practice the dark arts.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_fetid_sprinkler.d: A chilling hush, a scraping sound of things no more entombed in ground.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_whispering_fire.d: Guard your darkest thoughts well, for they are the cracks through which the Nightmare crawls.
mmorpg.unique_gear.kaoms_heart.desc: The warrior who fears will fall.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ngamahus_flame.desc: The savages claim the weapon was forged by their fire God.
mmorpg.unique_gear.kitavas_feast.desc: He vowed that when he broke free, he would devour every soul in the domain
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_supreme_truth.des: Knowledge brings power, and with power you can grab truth by the throat.
mmorpg.unique_gear.divinarius.desc: Divine intervention feels better when you do it yourself.
mmorpg.unique_gear.void_battery.desc: The trick is to give nothingness, and to receive everything in return.
mmorpg.unique_gear.apeps_rage.desc: His poison entraps, encircles, and engulfs the leaking mind of Man.
mmorpg.unique_gear.storm_prison.desc: You can never truly tame the tempest. You can barely even leash it.
mmorpg.unique_gear.reverberation_rod.des: If it's worth doing once, it's worth doing twice.
mmorpg.unique_gear.amplification_rod.des: No one likes a quiet encore.
mmorpg.unique_gear.moonsorrow.desc: Cast into darkness, and trapped for a thousand years, the lonely moon weeps.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_oculus.desc: A circular window of unlimited potential.
mmorpg.unique_gear.eschutas_temper.desc: And that was the last time he said no.
mmorpg.unique_gear.pledge_of_hands.desc: To shake a hand is to double your power.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ephemeral_edge.desc: In the rift between future and past, life passes quickly.
mmorpg.unique_gear.rebuke_of_the_vaal.de: Though they revered peace, it would have been suicide to rouse them to war
mmorpg.unique_gear.razor_of_the_seventh_: Quickly cooled the steel, but never could it forget, the heat of the forge.
mmorpg.unique_gear.oni_goroshi.desc: Your name is Demon Slayer? Really?
mmorpg.unique_gear.fate_of_the_vaal.desc: A sign of faithlessness through action.
mmorpg.unique_gear.story_of_the_vaal.des: Through war we found peace. Through death we found advancement.
mmorpg.unique_gear.nyctas_lantern.desc: the flame inside still blazed bright after her death.
mmorpg.unique_gear.soul_taker.desc: It is too easy for the soul to escape from an open heart.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_gryphon.desc: The gryphon knows only the hunt and the flight.
mmorpg.unique_gear.silverbranch.desc: The wild takes care of its own.
mmorpg.unique_gear.roths_reach.desc: Exiled to sea; what a joke. I'm more free than I've ever been.
mmorpg.unique_gear.xophs_inception.desc: Upon the red pyre we are born.
mmorpg.unique_gear.hopeshredder.desc: Their last thoughts were not of their friends.
mmorpg.unique_gear.chin_sol.desc: As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers, but that is not the case always.
mmorpg.unique_gear.nuros_harp.desc: Night's frost becomes morning's dew, darkness cleansed, pure and few.
mmorpg.unique_gear.voltaxic_rift.desc: The storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning rained down.
mmorpg.unique_gear.xophs_nurture.desc: Upon grey winds his love spreads.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_tempest.desc: Where steel-grey clouds gather and crash together, a storm is sure to follow.
mmorpg.unique_gear.pus_spitter.desc: The bolts of acid rained upon the enemy.
mmorpg.unique_gear.langer_briser.desc: Tear from your enemies their hearts, their lungs, their souls.
mmorpg.unique_gear.buriza_do_kyanon.desc: Did that crossbow just shoot out ice?!
mmorpg.unique_gear.doomslinger.desc: From the pits of hell, the hottest forges endure.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ichorstring.desc: The ichor looked sweet, but he knew looks could be deceiving.
mmorpg.unique_gear.hellrack.desc: A commonly used weapon in the Devil's arsenal.
mmorpg.unique_gear.gut_siphon.desc: Help! My intestine is coming out! No, no, no!
mmorpg.unique_gear.andvarius.desc: Danger is the price of wealth.
mmorpg.unique_gear.atziris_foible.desc: The world is but a piece of parchment.
mmorpg.unique_gear.doedres_damning.desc: Where her mouth should have been there was only a whirling, black void.
mmorpg.unique_gear.heartbound_loop.desc: When the axe finally fell, she shared his pain,
mmorpg.unique_gear.perandus_signet.desc: Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full. But our minds are still hungry.
mmorpg.unique_gear.shapers_seed.desc: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.
mmorpg.unique_gear.stone_of_lazhwar.desc: You are slow, foolish and ignorant. I am not.
mmorpg.unique_gear.winterheart.desc: Those who dwell in the deep freeze enjoy a special kind of madness.
mmorpg.unique_gear.mings_heart.desc: Ming slew tranquillity, took chaos for his wife, and on her immortal finger, he placed his heart
mmorpg.unique_gear.steelclash.desc: A clash of steel is a clash of hearts.
mmorpg.unique_gear.wall_of_the_eyeless.d: Deeply gazing into your very own soul.
mmorpg.unique_gear.umbral_disk.desc: The very threshold of life and death.
mmorpg.unique_gear.stormchaser.desc: Always chasing storms, which cannot be tamed.
mmorpg.unique_gear.tiamats_rebuke.desc: Fire, lightning, ice. This was all he could conjure.
mmorpg.unique_gear.gorebreaker.desc: Sure, there's many a hard man out there. But this'll soften them up.
mmorpg.unique_gear.frostbreath.desc: A merciful murderer swept through the streets, robbing breath from the weak and worthless.
mmorpg.unique_gear.warbreaker.desc: It is said that the best weapon is one that you never need to use. However, I disagree. The best weapon is the one that only needs to be used once.
mmorpg.unique_gear.mjolner.desc: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.
Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_fire_bomb: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_flower_of: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_lightning: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_magma_flo: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_throw_fla: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_thunder_o: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_thunderst: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.ormus_robes_whirlpool: Old wisdom and power surges through these fibers.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_step.desc: Even death can be outrun with these.
mmorpg.unique_gear.plaguewalker.desc: Step into the void and experience true freedom.
mmorpg.unique_gear.sunspite.desc: Burning Goddess, shine so bright. Set the world 'fore you alight.
mmorpg.unique_gear.dragons_talon.desc: Too heavily laden, unable to take flight.
mmorpg.unique_gear.dusktoe.desc: A lick of shadow may ease the petty frictions of one's life.
mmorpg.unique_gear.holy_march.desc: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.
mmorpg.unique_gear.crystal_shroud.desc: A reflective garment enchanted by a witch.
mmorpg.unique_gear.sparkoak.desc: As with all things, the wood was used for war.
mmorpg.unique_gear.root.desc: Don't flinch, it's a waste of good hitting time.
mmorpg.unique_gear.windshriek.desc: Your mind goes dark, your body weak.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_iron_fortress.des: Stand steadfast in the face of destruction.
mmorpg.unique_gear.greeds_embrace.desc: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
mmorpg.unique_gear.perfect_form_bow.desc: One space, one voice, one body.
mmorpg.unique_gear.perfect_form_xbow.des: One space, one voice, one body.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_covenant.desc: My soul is your strength, my price is your blood.
Her body and soul became ever more corrupted.
mmorpg.unique_gear.icetomb.desc: Let the world perish in ice.
mmorpg.unique_gear.alphas_roar.desc: Nature respects the strong and paints the snow red with the blood of the weak.
mmorpg.unique_gear.the_visage.desc: Deep in the catacombs she resides.
mmorpg.unique_gear.starkonjas_head.desc: There was no hero made out of his death, but merely a long sleep made eternal.
mmorpg.unique_gear.rime_gaze.desc: The malice in her gaze froze blood and shattered bone.
mmorpg.unique_gear.griffons_eye.desc: The mere sight sets sparks aflame
mmorpg.unique_gear.crown_of_ages.desc: Passed down through the generations, the crown befits just one.
mmorpg.unique_gear.abyssus.desc: When you have slain all your enemies, what is left to fear?
mmorpg.unique_gear.hrimnors_resolve.desc: His patience was as cold as ice, but his heart burned for vengeance.
mmorpg.unique_gear.harlequin_crest.desc: A perfect gem, or a powerful rune?
item.mmorpg.currency.crystal_of_truth.de: Transform Common Item into a Rare
item.mmorpg.currency.number_reroll.desc: Re-rolls explicit numbers on a gear
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_attributes: Adds to DEX, INT STR, VIT, WIL, AGI.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_ele_dmg: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Burning
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_burn: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_chill: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_poison: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_static: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chill_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Chilled
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit: Chance to multiply damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_shield: Decreases that amount of damage from every attack.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity: Determines your total: Critical Chance, Ranged Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity_flat_stat_req: Alters stat requirements of this item.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_hunger: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_poison: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_wither: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_atk_dmg: Adds x element damage on weapon hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_pene: Ignores that much resists, it works as subtraction.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_resist: Stops X percent damage of that element
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_damage: Spell power is used by spells and some other stats
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_wep_damage: Increases elemental damage of x weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_focus: Increases Dmg for that element by a percent but decreases dmg from all other elements.
mmorpg.stat_desc.extra_mob_drops: Mobs with this stat drop extra loot when slain.
mmorpg.stat_desc.faster_cast_rate: Reduces amount of time needed to cast spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_effect_on_self: Affects all heal effects applied to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_to_dmg: Adds your increased healing to your total spell damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.str_to_spell_dmg: Adds your strength to your total spell damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dex_to_bow_dmg: Adds your dexterity to your total bow damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dex_to_xbow_dmg: Adds your dexterity to your total crossbow damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.str_to_phys_dmg: Adds your strength to your physical weapon damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_to_mana: Adds your health to your mana.
mmorpg.stat_desc.healthregen_to_manarege: Adds your health regen to your mana regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_on_kill: Restore Health Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.hunger_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_healing: Increases all types of healing recieved like health regen, lifesteal, life on hit, spell heals etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Determines your total: All Elemental Damage, Magic Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence_flat_stat_: Alters stat requirements of this item.
mmorpg.stat_desc.life_on_hit: Gives health on basic attack hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.lifesteal: Percent of basic attack DMG added to health
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: Works like extra health. But regen is separate.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_on_kill: Restore Magic Shield Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_steal: Percent of basic attack DMG will restore magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_burn_resist: Protects against mana burn by x percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_cost_red: Reduces Mana Cost of all spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_on_kill: Restore Mana Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Poisoned
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.slow_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases DMG of all spells no matter the element
mmorpg.stat_desc.static_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Charged
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength: Determines your total: Critical Damage, Melee Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength_flat_stat_req: Alters stat requirements of this item.
mmorpg.stat_desc.turn_phys_to_ele: Turns % of phys atk dmg into ele
mmorpg.stat_desc.weapon_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.wither_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor_penetration_notab: This is a notable passive. They provide strong bonuses.
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit_notable: This is a notable passive. They provide strong bonuses.
mmorpg.stat_desc.attack_speed_notable: This is a notable passive. They provide strong bonuses.
mmorpg.stat_desc.faster_cast_rate_notabl: This is a notable passive. They provide strong bonuses.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_resist_notabl: This is a notable passive. They provide strong bonuses.
mmorpg.stat_desc.cdr_notable: This is a notable passive. They provide strong bonuses.
mmorpg.stat_desc.arcane_devotion: This is a keystone passive. They are generally game changing.
mmorpg.stat_desc.iron_reflexes: This is a keystone passive. They are generally game changing.
mmorpg.stat_desc.vaal_pact: This is a keystone passive. They are generally game changing.
mmorpg.stat_desc.zealots_oath: This is a keystone passive. They are generally game changing.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ghost_reaver: This is a keystone passive. They are generally game changing.
mmorpg.stat_desc.acrobatics: This is a keystone passive. They are generally game changing.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_imbue_crit: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mod_imbue_phys: This is a modifier for the spell. You can view the changes in the spell tooltip.
